topic.title: HISTOLOGY CONFIRMED NECROTISING ENTEROCOLITIS FOLLOWING LAPAROTOMY INDICATOR
topic.shortdesc: For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care, HISTOLOGY CONFIRMED NECROTISING ENTEROCOLITIS FOLLOWING LAPAROTOMY INDICATOR is reported when the PATIENT underwent a laparotomy based on the result of an Abdominal X-Ray.
